data.name: ThrowHelper_ErrorObjectType_TypeInspectorCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: Could not load the type inspector while building type {0}

data.name: ThrowHelper_ErrorObjectType_MessageWasNotDefinedOnError
data.value: Error while building type {0}. The runtime type {1} does not defined a property `Message`

data.name: ThrowHelper_InputMiddleware_ArgumentTypeNameMissMatch
data.value: Could not find a unique type name for input type of the argument {0} on field {1}. The type name {2} collides with {3}. Check the attribute `[Input(TypeName= "{2}")]` or the method `.Input(typeName: "{2}")` on type {4} for naming collisions.

data.name: ThrowHelper_NonMutationFields
data.value: There are mutation annotations on non mutation fields. The mutation conventions can only be applied to fields of the mutation type.

data.name: ThrowHelper_MutationPayloadMustBeObject
data.value: The mutation payload type `{0}` must be an object type.

data.name: ThrowHelper_MutationConvDirective_In_Wrong_Location
data.value: The schema building directive `@mutation` can only be applied on object fields.

data.name: ThrowHelper_DirectiveArgument_Unexpected_Value
data.value: The argument `{0}` of the `@mutation` directive must be null or a {1} value.

data.name: ThrowHelper_UnknownDirectiveArgument
data.value: `{0}` is not a valid argument of the directive `@mutation`.
